Help Page

This app is designed to help parents take care of their child’s health. It has three key pages: Home Page, Growth Tracker, and Chatbot. Below, you will find information on what each page has to offer.
Home
The main page of the app. It displays Articles, Reminders, and Hospitals.
1. Articles:\n- Browse through various articles on child health. \n- One article is selected for you each day, but you also have access to all the articles.

2. Reminders:
- You can set reminders about your child's health appointments and tasks.
- The next upcoming reminder is displayed on the home page. 
- You will receive a notification on the time you set for the reminder.
3. Nearby Hospitals:\n- Find hospitals near your location for any urgent health needs.
Growth Tracker
This page helps you track your child’s growth with two main tabs: Measurements and Charts. To use it, you will have to register your child\'s profile.
1. Managing Children:\n- Add or manage children’s profiles via the "Manage Children" link.
2. Measurements:\n- Select your child from a dropdown menu to view their measurements.\n- Add or update measurements for your child.

3. Charts:
- Visualize your child's growth over time with easy-to-read WHO (World Health Organisation) charts.
- Charts update automatically when new measurements are added. 
- You can share those charts, for example with your doctor.
Chatbot
This page provides an interactive chatbot to answer your questions about child health. The chatbot supports the following features:
1. Answering questions:\n- Consider the chatbot as a virtual assistant. It will help you and answer all your health-related questions.
2. Retrieving articles:\n- The chatbot has access to the articles database. Therefore, it will redirect you to an article to provide accurate information.
3. Interpreting symptoms:\n- You can give the chatbot symptoms and it will diagnose the most probable disease.

Feel free to explore each section and make the most out of our app to ensure your child\'s health and wellbeing. If you have any questions or need further assistance, our chatbot is always available to help!
